description: This dashboard helps to visualise the aerospike backup service statistics.

panels.description:
Total backup success count, 
Total incremental backup success count.

targets.expr: count by (type) (aerospike_backup_service_backup_events_total{job=~"$job_name", instance=~"$instance", type=~"$type", outcome="success", routine=~"$routine"})

panels.title: Success (count)

panels.description:
Total backup failures, 
Total  incremental  backup failures.
panels.title: Failures (count)

panels.description:

panels.title: Skip (count)
